value:
The Day of Devotion lives up to its
name. Every face I see is lit up with
a smile, like a flower in bloom.

In my desperate future, almost all
blossoms have withered away. That is
why I want to protect these flowers.

I can't believe you prepared such a
gorgeous outfit for me. Should I wear
my mask as well? Hmm...maybe not.

Never forget to hold on to your
feelings of gratitude. That mindset is
important, no matter where you are.

I'm looking for flowers that will suit
my father. If you find any that you
think he'll like, please let me know.

On this Day of Devotion, I come with
words of gratitude from the castle
of $Nf.

Fate can be changed by the power
of love!
I hope many smiles bloom today!

Kyah! I blame this on my dress! I'm
not used to wearing such things, and
the hem got tangled...

I've heard your wishes. With this
power, I will ensure the future is
filled with love and flowers!

The Day of Devotion... I'm not used
to such extravagance! But I'll try my
best to cherish every moment.

A world without flowers, where all life
has slowly withered away... Can you
imagine, $Nu?$k$pThat's the world I'm from, the world I
want to prevent. There, no one could
think of love...only survival.$k$pI traveled here in hopes that,
together, my father and I could stop
that horrible future from happening.$k$pI want to restore the world to one
where people can focus on love and
gratitude. Where flowers can bloom.$k$pI won't give up on a future where
everyone can cherish that beauty. We
all deserve such a happy world.$k$pI hope that whatever happens, the
future of Askr is overflowing with
love. Together, we can make it so.
たあっ
どうです？
きゃっ…
どうして…？
You're going to love this.
A token of my gratitude!
May my love reach father!
Enjoying the festival?
Signed...and sealed...
Huh?
This is a festival of love, isn't it? This is my chance to show everyone just how much they mean to me.
Hm? Oh, is something stuck in my hair?
I'd better get these flowers delivered while they're still alive!
*chuckle* Do you like my flower crown?
I had my own idea for an outfit, but no one seemed to like it...
Nothing makes me happier than showing my parents that I love them.
I've truly come to appreciate you. I hope you know you mean a lot to me.
Show me the way.
Oh?
Special delivery!
